column4: can anyone recommend a good ssh client for windows to ubuntu (SSH server)
ive been trying to use it but keep getting errors
i keep getting a network error
when trying to connect my ubuntu and windows computers over the internet
i am running the sshd server on this computer
and trying to access with my laptop
that is using the internet through the wifi of my droid
did you port forward port 22 on your router?
did you verify, locally, that you can ssh into the server?
can you verify the sshd is running
i just did a restart of ssh
yes, like Leroy said use nmap after to verity the port is open, you can also try this: netstat -t -l
then try to ssh in to your server
